name: get_status
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sms77io.
Tool description: Send SMS & text-to-speech messages, perform phone number lookups and much more via seven.io.
API description: Retrieve the delivery status report for a given message ID using the provided API key.

msg_id.description: The unique identifier of the SMS message. This can be obtained by setting the parameter `JSON`, `return_msg_id` or `details` to `1` when sending the SMS via the API. It can also be retrieved from the message journal in the user area.
